extendedInfo.description: The Toronto Crime Stoppers Mobile App was developed with one goal in mind; a safer Toronto for you!Download this FREE application and youâll be on the leading edge of citizen crime prevention. Not only will you be promoting a safer community for your family and friends but you may be entitled to receive up to $2000.00 for your tip submissions!Crime Stoppers Toronto wanted to bring you a more convenient tool for tip submissions; past methods included calling into the hotline, âtext messageâ response and filling out a long online form.With this new technology the user has the ability to:â¢	Record a video or photograph for easy tip submission.â¢	Find the nearest police station using GPS and receive turn by turn directions.â¢	Check the status of submitted tips.â¢	View Torontoâs âMost Wantedâ.â¢	One touch calling directly to a Crime Stoppers Representative.â¢	One touch email composition to submit an email tip.â¢	View Torontoâs âCrime of the Weekâ.â¢	Connect with Toronto Crime Stoppers Social Media Pages.Toronto Crime Stoppers collects none of your personal information. Your tips are 100% anonymous, your identity is protected by the Supreme Court of Canada. You are provided with a unique user name and password and the app collect your âPush Messageâ ID so you can receive real time alerts about your submitted tips. We donât collect any of your contact information!If you like our App and would like to see your city develop something similar, contact your local Crime Stoppers Program and let them know about us!Although crime is reported daily, there is a large number of unreported incidents every day. The leading contributor for that is fear, now with the Toronto Crime Stoppers Mobile App you can put those fears aside. Think prevention, think Crime Stoppers.Itâs time to take back your communities!You Stay Anonymous, Criminals Donât!

reviews.title: Works with Galaxy S2 HD LTE
reviews.comment: Reminder: upon submitting the tip please do the folloeing lists:  - do not reformat phobe because youll lose the tip.  - do record the login and pw details somewhere off the phone. Good chance you can log in using that details in their web.  - do record the back up details of submissions in text, picture and video. Save it on your email server.  Finally, always always dont mention your personal info such as a name because you are Anonymous.  This helps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I live in Scarborough, so this  might come in handy!

reviews.title: Have submitted a tip
reviews.comment: Submitted a tip but the tip status disappeared after an hour. No notification if the tip was received. Tip status screen remains blank. Would be nice if I could see.if the tip is used or not. This is after the most recent update.

reviews.title: Not the first and not the best
reviews.comment: I will stick with TIP SUBMIT by CRIME REPORTS more security and better hacker protection.  works anywhere in the world and not just Toronto.  Info gets to all Crime Stoppers offices through the SECURE network and not email  like this one.  would also suggest you have optional icons for smart phones so it doesnt CRIME STOPPERS logo doesnt show ip on phone.

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seems like a pretty useful app.
reviews.comment: At first appearance it seems to be pretty decent. It\'s fairly easy to submit an email or photo or video attachment, which can be a real help. I\'ll just assume the app records and provides a notification of receipt upon submission as I\'d rather not clog up Crime Stoppers with useless test photos.  My only gripe is that from a design perspective, the interface is a direct port from the iPhone UI. Don\'t expect menu buttons to be in logical places, and you can\'t view in landscape, see videos in full screen or use your native camera app for taking pictures.  Perhaps in a future release we\'ll see this design changes.
reviews.author: A Google User
